module.name: organization
module.label: Organization module
module.description: Adds support for experiments, studies, projects, and other organizational structures and 'data containers'. Depends on: core.xml, auth.xml

entity.name: Individual
entity.description: The Individuals class defines the subjects that are used as observation target. The Individual class maps to XGAP:Individual and PaGE:Individual. Groups of individuals can be defined via Panel.

field.name: Mother
field.description: Refers to the mother of the individual.

field.name: Father
field.description: Refers to the father of the individual.

entity.name: Panel
entity.description: The Panel class defines groups of individuals based on cohort design, case/controls, families, etc. For instance: 'LifeLines cohort', 'middle aged man', 'recombinant mouse inbred Line dba x b6' or 'Smith family'. A Panel can act as a single ObservationTarget. For example: average height (Measurement) in the LifeLines cohort (Panel) is 174cm (ObservedValue). The Panel class maps to XGAP:Strain and PaGE:Panel classes. In METABASE this is assumed there is one panel per study.

field.name: PanelType
field.description: Indicate the type of Panel (example: Sample panel, AssayedPanel, Natural=wild type, Parental=parents of a cross, F1=First generation of cross, RCC=Recombinant congenic, CSS=chromosome substitution)

field.name: Species
field.description: The species this panel is an instance of, part of or extracted from.

field.name: Individuals
field.description: The list of individuals in this panel

field.name: Background
field.description: Short piece of information describing why the study is taking place, e.g. risk factors for a population

field.name: Background
field.description: Short piece of information describing why the study is taking place, e.g. risk factors for a population

field.name: Objectives
field.description: What this study aims to achieve

field.name: Accession
field.description: (Optional) URI or accession number to indicate source of Study. E.g. arrayexpress:M-EXP-2345

entity.name: Citation
entity.description:
Citation of a document or data set. Publications have attributes of publications Authors and also DOI and Pubmed identifiers (when these are available). These are represented as OntologyTerms as in the MAGE-TAB model all 'xrefs' (cross references) for ontologies and accession numbers are handled generically. An example of a publication is available in an IDF file from ArrayExpress is experiment E-MTAB-506 ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/microarray/data/experiment/TABM/E-TABM-506/E-TABM-506.idf.txt
.
The FuGE equivalent to Publication is FuGE::Bibliographic Reference.

field.name: authorList
field.description: The names of the authors of the publication

entity.name: Contribution
entity.description: A contribution describes the part a Person has contributed to a Contributable item.
